TEXT.English: Specialists in entertaiment! Live concerts, movies, musicals, theatre, videos, CDs, DVDs, Blu-rays... everything to make your days cheer up!

TEXT.Spanish: Specialists in entertaiment! Live concerts, movies, musicals, theatre, videos, CDs, DVDs, Blu-rays... everything to make your days cheer up!

TEXT.English: Your local theater for your daily entertainment.

TEXT.English: Build this corporation in order to get entertainment bonuses.
